thread.title: Kayandra Mcgregor
thread.title_full: LightInTheBox 的点评人 Kayandra Mcgregor

author: Kayandra Mcgregor
title: Kayandra Mcgregor
text: I have made a few purchases recently and so far the service is great. i have to admit the shipping time frame is a little bit long but otherwise great products at a very reasonable price..i love it and would recommend shopping on Light In The Box through Ebates it helps you get cash back on the items you purchase in almost every available online stores and send you your cash back check rewarding you for shopping online. Give it a try people, Check it out at Ebates./r/MKAYAN3?eeid=28187. Happy shopping. Please put the .com
